This cool extension can does these things:

- Do typing animation of a twitter thread and optionally speak the tweet using text-to-speech available from your system!
- Create aesthetic tweet quotes, customize background and of course animated the tweet. Visit https://automaticfakechatgenerator.web.app/twitter/index.html to start enter the tweet link.
